channel.title: Midnight [PI] its an unique server just take a look
channel.description:
[size=14pt]Midnight [/size] Forum :[url=http://midnight.top-talk.com/]http://midnight.top-talk.com/[/url] Webclient :[url=http://www.rswebclients.com/play/midnight]http://www.rswebclients.com/play/midnight[/url] Note :My server; i alread uploaded an advertice b4, but that was a long time ago but it doesn't realy fit anymore. so i'll tell u what i added or updated.
- Base is trisidiaXv3 (used some things from this as well) - Guides helped me as well. - Apollo helped as well, to find correct places, ids, npc ids, coords ect.
- Penguin place (::pengu) - Dungeoneering (made it my selfs, ea room gives exp afther finishing, and gives u dungeoneering points) - Zombie minnigame (people think its the same as the releases but i actualy changed it fully, its not even close anymore to the main 1) - the home has been changed pretty nicely, its in a dark place ect. Witch fits the name ofc. - The Npc,(shop npc) have been changed to scary npc, like ghoasts, vampires ect. - i changed some altars, because they look to mainstream for me. - Closely all bosses added, and dragons ect - working on a eliten dungeoneering quest zone. will be finished soon. - Finished godwars (my own way, it doesn't look like the normal godwars, again to main stream for me) - I made bosses drop keys, for a crystal box (been added in a lot servers) - made an new chest, with black keys, only the strong bosses dropping these, and these gives u nice items like phats, vesta, torva ect. - changed rock crabs places - Afther finishing dungeoneering, u get an random item, can be from barrow's to corrupt vesta, dragon ect. like a lot of items - Added emotes on some new skill capes, i made a cape, when u reach all the skills max, u can buy it (or receif it at home) and u get an emote on it, a nice 1 - Dungeoneering skillcape, has dungeoneering emote to - Pest controle ect, working fine - All the skills work, sometims the emote laggs, atm trieing to fix it. - New added donator zone - Made the fact donators, they get the items easier, but if ure not a donator ure able to wear all the items and get all the items as well. - A little server, like closely no 1 loggs. - fixed the total level, u can get to 2475 now (in total level) - made a skelleton zone, this is like the real runescape, u teleport to a place with agressive monkey skelletons lvl 142, they hit 20s if u don't use protection for prayer, 1-2s if u do use it. would be smart to use it, they drop full skelleton, pretty slowly but yes they drop it - Made costume claws, well more like, made the white claws and black claws able to use a special and hit u. (ofc dragon claws are still stronger) - Made a donator store, fine its not realy a good thing for some people, but i made sure it would not unbalance the intire eco. - I changed the pk store, since it don't like it if there are to much diff sets inside ect. - I'm trieing to make some nice unique items inside the server, atm its not realy that unique yet. but soon this server will have a lot of unique things. - Summoning added ofc, its working. - items added, well torva, dfs, ags,bgs,zgs,sgs, death cape, primal, ect. lets say closely all the items from moost servers, atm not planning to make more items ect for now. i think the items i have are good enough to start with. - Skills: well all the skills are added, like well evrything except for construction, i made pk skill in that place, (pk skill added in some other servers i know.) - An other fact; i like to code a lot ect, but i don't like it if people get on and start begging for mod or admin, or just say my server sucks because i don't directly give items or ranks. so if ure a begger for rank ect, please just stay away, or play it without begging. - Main reason i made this, is for people to find a server who isn't copy pasted or just name changed, i like variation my selfs in server. So i make a lot of new things (ofc i keep the old 1s) it might have a lot of portals or things like that, but at least, there is a lot to do. - i'm also from belguim, so my main lang isn't english+ i have dyslexia, so i rather dun have comments on my english or mistakes

This is the reward (bones are always there, but the crystal key is able to change to a lot of random items.) [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/607/skelletonzoneteleporter.png/][IMG]http://img607.imageshack.us/img607/9650/skelletonzoneteleporter.png[/img][/URL] Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL] Skeletons zone it selfs: [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/90/skelletonzone.png/][IMG]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/5126/skelletonzone.png[/img][/URL] Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL] Zombie teleporter: Zombie floor 1 (atm only 3 going to add more, when i finished the dungeon) [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/442/zombiefloor1.png/][IMG]http://img442.imageshack.us/img442/4566/zombiefloor1.png[/img][/URL] Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL] Zombie floor 2 (when u teleport from floor to floor, u get points.) [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/40/zombiefloor2.png/][IMG]http://img40.imageshack.us/img40/1097/zombiefloor2.png[/img][/URL] Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL] Last floor in zombie (this is atm the last floor, u'll be able to go and buy items out of the store) [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/22/finalzombiefloor.png/][IMG]http://img22.imageshack.us/img22/9951/finalzombiefloor.png[/img][/URL] Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL] This is the penguin zone, these drop pinguin mask, egg, staff: [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/153/penguinzone.png/][IMG]http://img153.imageshack.us/img153/4852/penguinzone.png[/img][/URL] Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL] These are some portals, the Bosses or npc u cannot find inside the teleporters, i made a portal for those (note: it sometimes asks u lvls needed, the reason of that is, because tis a dangerouse portal, spiritbeast ect.) [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/802/portalsn.png/][IMG]http://img802.imageshack.us/img802/7843/portalsn.png[/img][/URL] Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL] This is the midnight boss, he's a big pain, u need to have at least 3-4 ppl to fight this 1 without dieing: [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/545/strongestbossofmidnight.png/][IMG]http://img545.imageshack.us/img545/7494/strongestbossofmidnight.png[/img][/URL] Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL] This is the skilling teleport tab: just to show u its not like the moost servers (at least i think so) [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/708/skillteleporter.png/][IMG]http://img708.imageshack.us/img708/633/skillteleporter.png[/img][/URL] Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL] This is the Last picture, This is the fact SOF is added (i delited the title shop for now, since i'm planning to do something else with it) [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/708/skillteleporter.png/][IMG]http://img708.imageshack.us/img708/633/skillteleporter.png[/img][/URL] Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL] Note: i hope u liked it, There will change a lot evry day, so i cannot keep evryone up to date for now.

item.title: Midnight [PI] its an unique server just take a look
item.dc:creator: @Cruel_Truth Cruel Truth
item.description:
@Cruel_Truth wrote:

the last picture is the same as the one before it ( so what is sof? )

you put ungeoneering instead of dungeoneering

you put skelletons instead of skeletons

besides that good luck I can see your trying to make it different.

edit: and change your jar name xD…

stupid me didn’t realize it was rswebclient…

Edit #2: I like the concept I really do , but I just find it somewhat hard to really navigate the shops etc…I might check this out later.

Read full topic
item.source: Midnight [PI] its an unique server just take a look

item.title: Midnight [PI] its an unique server just take a look
item.dc:creator: @YuraK YuraK
item.description:
@YuraK wrote:

[size=14pt]Midnight [/size]
Forum :http://midnight.top-talk.com/
Webclient :http://www.rswebclients.com/play/midnight
Note :My server; i alread uploaded an advertice b4, but that was a long time ago but it doesn’t realy fit anymore. so i’ll tell u what i added or updated.

- Base is trisidiaXv3 (used some things from this as well) - Guides helped me as well. - Apollo helped as well, to find correct places, ids, npc ids, coords ect.
- Penguin place (::pengu) - Dungeoneering (made it my selfs, ea room gives exp afther finishing, and gives u dungeoneering points) - Zombie minnigame (people think its the same as the releases but i actualy changed it fully, its not even close anymore to the main 1) - the home has been changed pretty nicely, its in a dark place ect. Witch fits the name ofc. - The Npc,(shop npc) have been changed to scary npc, like ghoasts, vampires ect. - i changed some altars, because they look to mainstream for me. - Closely all bosses added, and dragons ect - working on a eliten dungeoneering quest zone. will be finished soon. - Finished godwars (my own way, it doesn't look like the normal godwars, again to main stream for me) - I made bosses drop keys, for a crystal box (been added in a lot servers) - made an new chest, with black keys, only the strong bosses dropping these, and these gives u nice items like phats, vesta, torva ect. - changed rock crabs places - Afther finishing dungeoneering, u get an random item, can be from barrow's to corrupt vesta, dragon ect. like a lot of items - Added emotes on some new skill capes, i made a cape, when u reach all the skills max, u can buy it (or receif it at home) and u get an emote on it, a nice 1 - Dungeoneering skillcape, has dungeoneering emote to - Pest controle ect, working fine - All the skills work, sometims the emote laggs, atm trieing to fix it. - New added donator zone - Made the fact donators, they get the items easier, but if ure not a donator ure able to wear all the items and get all the items as well. - A little server, like closely no 1 loggs. - fixed the total level, u can get to 2475 now (in total level) - made a skelleton zone, this is like the real runescape, u teleport to a place with agressive monkey skelletons lvl 142, they hit 20s if u don't use protection for prayer, 1-2s if u do use it. would be smart to use it, they drop full skelleton, pretty slowly but yes they drop it - Made costume claws, well more like, made the white claws and black claws able to use a special and hit u. (ofc dragon claws are still stronger) - Made a donator store, fine its not realy a good thing for some people, but i made sure it would not unbalance the intire eco. - I changed the pk store, since it don't like it if there are to much diff sets inside ect. - I'm trieing to make some nice unique items inside the server, atm its not realy that unique yet. but soon this server will have a lot of unique things. - Summoning added ofc, its working. - items added, well torva, dfs, ags,bgs,zgs,sgs, death cape, primal, ect. lets say closely all the items from moost servers, atm not planning to make more items ect for now. i think the items i have are good enough to start with. - Skills: well all the skills are added, like well evrything except for construction, i made pk skill in that place, (pk skill added in some other servers i know.) - An other fact; i like to code a lot ect, but i don't like it if people get on and start begging for mod or admin, or just say my server sucks because i don't directly give items or ranks. so if ure a begger for rank ect, please just stay away, or play it without begging. - Main reason i made this, is for people to find a server who isn't copy pasted or just name changed, i like variation my selfs in server. So i make a lot of new things (ofc i keep the old 1s) it might have a lot of portals or things like that, but at least, there is a lot to do. - i'm also from belguim, so my main lang isn't english+ i have dyslexia, so i rather dun have comments on my english or mistakes

These are some portals, the Bosses or npc u cannot find inside the teleporters, i made a portal for those (note: it sometimes asks u lvls needed, the reason of that is, because tis a dangerouse portal, spiritbeast ect.)

Uploaded with ImageShack.us

This is the midnight boss, he’s a big pain, u need to have at least 3-4 ppl to fight this 1 without dieing:

Uploaded with ImageShack.us

This is the skilling teleport tab: just to show u its not like the moost servers (at least i think so)

Uploaded with ImageShack.us

This is the Last picture, This is the fact SOF is added (i delited the title shop for now, since i’m planning to do something else with it)

Uploaded with ImageShack.us

Note: i hope u liked it, There will change a lot evry day, so i cannot keep evryone up to date for now.
